name: Tales of Cthulhu Part 2:The Black Hill
name_original: Tales of Cthulhu Part 2:The Black Hill
description:
The 2nd part of a 3 part Lovecraftian horror fpsc game series

I made this over a decade ago it was my 2nd game ever and as such is very flawed

you play a private eye who is investigating the disappearance of a professor in the 1940s you visit a local insane asylum to listen to the story of a local policeman driven mad by what he saw
